info.title: spot-trading-hub
info.description: A Node.js application for managing crypto exchange spot orders

post.description: Order cryptocurrency pairs according to user preference
Add a cryptocurrency pair to user's list

delete.description: Remove a cryptocurrency pair from user's list

parameters.description: Optional bot ID to filter trading pairs
parameters.name: botId

parameters.description: Bot ID for the trading pairs
parameters.name: botId

requestBody.description: Array of trading pairs to create (without id)

schema.description: Array of trading pairs to create (without id)

put.description: Update a trading pair by ID

requestBody.description: Partial trading pair data to update

schema.description: Partial trading pair data to update

post.description: Cancels an order on the specified exchange
Cancels all orders for a symbol on the specified exchange
Places a trailing take profit limit sell order on the specified exchange

get.description: Get all open orders for the specified exchange

parameters.name: exchange

parameters.name: exchange

post.description: Get user trades for a specific symbol

parameters.name: exchange

post.description: Fetch recent filled orders from the specified exchange and log them
Sync full order history for a specific symbol from the exchange

parameters.name: exchange

get.description: Get symbol information from a specific exchange

parameters.description: The exchange to get symbol info from
parameters.name: exchange

get.description: Get all orders for a specific bot
Get paginated orders from all bots with filtering
Get configuration for a specific bot

Update numPairs for a specific bot
